sourcesContent:
<template>
  <base-card>
    <base-button @click="setSelectedTab('all-bootcamps')" :mode="selectedTab === 'all-bootcamps'? 'all-bootcamps':'add-bootcamp'">Bootcamps</base-button>
    <base-button @click="setSelectedTab('add-bootcamp')">Add a bootcamp</base-button>
  </base-card>
  <component :is="selectedTab"></component>
</template>

<script>
import AllBootcamps from './AllBootcamps.vue';
import AddBootcamp from './AddBootcamp.vue';

export default {
    components: {
        AllBootcamps,
        AddBootcamp
    },
    data() {
        return {
            selectedTab: '',
            bootcamps: [
        {
          name: 'frontend-bootcamps',
          description: 'a complete frontend bootcamps',
          phone: '0789878719',
          email: 'frontend@gmail.com',
          website: 'http://frontend.com',
          address: 'douai',
        },
        {
          name: 'backend-bootcamps',
          description: 'a complete backend bootcamps',
          phone: '0789878723',
          email: 'backend@gmail.com',
          website: 'http://backend.com',
          address: 'lille',
        },
      ],
        }
    },
    provide: {},
    methods: {
        setSelectedTab(tab) {
            this.selectedTab = tab;
        }
    }
}
</script>
